message: Wasn't on my Top 5 list, but am really liking Human Target more and more. Just saw ep. 2/10 Cool Hand Guerrero - what a GREAT character he is.
I'm like halfway though the first season... should really try to wrap that up soon, it's a fun show
Yeah, this is a fun show, I agree.  And it's getting better.  Not going to win any awards, but I'll admit I do look forward to watching it.
They have solid action
Too bad it's probably going to be cancelled
@chrischen21 Oh really? Source on that?
they started showing mid-season
mid-season is where shows go to die
also their ratings are low
Oh, say it ain't so!
also the show is decent, that's another sign it's going to be cancelled
http://tvbythenumbers.zap2it.com/2011/01/25/fox-fringe-fine-for-first-friday/80047
I really hope they keep the show around though, it's been great this season.
Not according to the discussion forums on the Fox Human Target site. Sheesh. They hate the addition of the women this season. I like them, and I agree with you- it's been a great season.
Really? That's America's TV audience for you. I think the Ilsa character has brought a great dynamic to the show.
Agreed.
Yeah, I liked the addition too.  Who wants to watch a show full of just dudes anyway?
It was a great episode tonight!
@Anneflo Haven't seen it yet, but looking forward to it
I haven't seen it yet either, but a friend mentioned it may be his favorite yet, looking forward to it.
